message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the benefits it'll bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000 for it.

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see a significant return on your investment.
Hello Alice, I've given it some thought and I'm willing to go up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
